definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Presently she started up, exclaiming that they wouldbe late for breakfast;
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿她跳了起来，嚷着他们要耽误早饭了。
不一会儿，一辆捄护车到了。

sentences.english: Soon, the villa came the dull sound of dogs barking a few.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，别墅里传出数声沉闷的狗叫声。

sentences.english: A little later, Gao Yishan two of them then fainted on the table.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，高义山他们两个便晕倒在桌子上。
不一会儿，窗户拼出来了。

sentences.english: Soon, all the blue-wizard both eat something the cake.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，所有的蓝精灵都吃起了蛋糕。

sentences.english: Within a short while larger cloud point and became light rain points.
sentences.chinese: 不一会雾点变大，成了小雨点。

sentences.english: In a moment her eyes grew moist, and her glance drooped to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，她的眼睛湿润了，目光垂到了地上。

sentences.english: Before long, the cowshed gate is opened three times.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，牛栏的门第三次打开了。

sentences.english: After a while, I arrived at Zhan Jiang City, a very beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿来到湛江市，很美丽的城市。

sentences.english: Soon we heard the sound of the lorry revving up and moving off.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，我们听到了卡车起动和开走的声音。

sentences.english: Mary and John quarreled, but made up after a while.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉和约翰吵架了，但不一会就和好了。

sentences.english: Soon we had left the river estuary and were heading towards the open sea.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，我们离开了河口湾，向公海前进。

sentences.english: In a few minutes he reappeared.
After a while he began to feel sleepy and decided that he would lie down and disgest his meal in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿他有些犯困，便决定还是先躺下来消消食。

sentences.english: Soon the sun slowly showed half of her face.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，太阳渐渐露出了半个脸。

definition: like a wisp of smoke/(to disappear etc) in an instant
not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
to be just about to/to have just started to
a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
three, set five remove two (abacus rule)/efficiently/quickly and easily
